sentences.english: In the world of today, absolute majority countries have parties and exercise party politics.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界，绝大多数国家都存在政党，实行政党政治。

sentences.english: I won't forget you all my life, you will be in my mind forever.
sentences.chinese: 今生今世我都不会忘记你，你将是我永远的记忆。

sentences.english: Conson your present happy ghost, meet a new girlfriend Annie.
sentences.chinese: 开心鬼的今世康森贵，结识了新女友安妮。

sentences.english: If there are living beings who wish to see Amitabha Buddha in this lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 其有众生欲于今世见阿弥陀佛者。

sentences.english: Reform is a prevailing trend in today's world.
sentences.chinese: 变革是当今世界的潮流。

sentences.english: Servitization is one of the development movements in modern manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 服务化是当今世界制造业发展趋势之一。

sentences.english: Radio broadcasting is the only non-visual medium in the world.
sentences.chinese: 广播是当今世界上惟一的非视觉传媒。

sentences.english: Every believer can experience and attest to the truth of the message in their life (or not).
sentences.chinese: 每个信士都可以在今世体验并证明这个使命是否正确。

sentences.english: Dreams, cycle of three thousand years, at the world stage.
sentences.chinese: 魂牵梦萦，三千年的轮回，于今世上演。

sentences.english: Abad's Angosta is fables in today's world.
sentences.chinese: 阿瓦德的《深谷幽城》是一部当今世界的寓言。

sentences.english: I think this will become the chief concern of the world today.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这将成为当今世界的首要关心的问题。

sentences.english: It is the development trend for countries all over the world to place restrictions on the IPRs abuse.
sentences.chinese: 限制知识产权滥用是当今世界各国的发展趋势。

sentences.english: The religious battles that exist in the world today can be traced back to the christs'era.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界存在的宗教斗争可以追溯到基督年代。

sentences.english: With the development of contemporary industry- a growing number of people are flowing into full-size cities.
sentences.chinese: 随着今世工业的发扬，越来越多的人涌向大都邑。

sentences.english: Jimmie had but a vague idea of world conditions now.
sentences.chinese: 吉米对当今世界情况只有一点模糊的了解。

sentences.english: NBA is almost ranked as the highest level in today's basketball world.
sentences.chinese: NBA几乎代表当今世界篮坛的最高水平。

definition: to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
generation/period of 30 years/one's whole lifetime/lifelong/age/era/times/the whole world/the First (of numbered European kings)
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
